title: 47 Life After Prison: Journey to Becoming the World's Best Jazz Violinist with Christian Howes
description: Back with part two, a continuation from last week's School of Greatness with Christian Howes. Last week was all about his experience with prison, how he got there, what he did while there and his trial and tribulations. This time around, we discuss the journey from the prison gates to the top of the Jazz world.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
